altTitles.zh-ro: Kuángnǚ Chóngshēng: Wánkù Qī Huáng Fēi
Kuangnu Chongsheng: Wanku Qi Huang Fei

altTitles.en: Vengeful Rebirth: The Seventh Prince's Consort
Revenge! The Princess Against the World

altTitles.ja: 狂女転生～裏切られた王妃の復讐

altTitles.th: บัลลังค์รักพระชายาเจ็ด

description.en:
She was powerful and got unparalleled martial arts in her last life, but she paid her true heart wrongly and resulted in death. After the rebirth, she vowed to destroy the one who hurt her, ruin the one who framed her and…

Source: MangaToon

---
She was powerful and got unparalleled martial arts in her last life, but she paid her true heart wrongly and resulted in death. After the rebirth, she vowed to destroy the one  hurt her, ruin the one who framed her and ruined her.

---
